title: Recent advances in Fe, Mo-based electrocatalysts for nitrogen reduction under ambient conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3020-3035
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00471J, Communication
Xiaoyu Li, Yutong Yang, Qin Ding, Yin Wang
A comprehensive overview on the recent advances in Fe-based, Mo based and Fe&Mo based catalysts for electrochemical NRR under ambient conditions.
